name: Shaq's Dream
description:
Initially made during this game jam.

I planned to turn this one into a bit of a room puzzle game, but ended up having to settle for... something else.

You can play in your browser, but a download is also available for Windows. The total download size for the web version is ~38MB, so it might take a while to load depending on your bandwidth.

Controls

Mouse clicks and WASD baby! You'll figure out the rest.

Attribution
  • Made with Unity Pro 2021.1 by Unity Technologies ApS.
  • Made with FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.
  • Music and some SFX made with Image-Line FL Studio & Native Instruments VSTs.
  • "GlitchEffect" by staffantan (CC BY 3.0).
  • CC0 sounds sourced from freesound.org.
  • CC0 textures sourced from polyhaven.com/textures.
